item.skyforged_dream.black_pearl.descrip: Looks like an ordinary pearl, even if it is black,|but for some reason it is unpleasant to hold it in your hands.
item.skyforged_dream.raw_anadium.descrip: Extremely toxic metal that causes suffocation
block.skyforged_dream.pearl_shell.descri: There's something inside! Is it possible to open it with something?
